[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/teamsfx](./teamsfx.md) &gt; [TeamsFx](./teamsfx.teamsfx.md) &gt; [getCredential](./teamsfx.teamsfx.getcredential.md)

## TeamsFx.getCredential() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Credential instance according to identity type choice.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCredential(): TokenCredential;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

TokenCredential

instance implements TokenCredential interface.

## Remarks

If user identity is chose, will return [TeamsUserCredential](./teamsfx.teamsusercredential.md) in browser environment and [OnBehalfOfUserCredential](./teamsfx.onbehalfofusercredential.md) in NodeJS. If app identity is chose, will return [M365TenantCredential](./teamsfx.m365tenantcredential.md)<!-- -->.
